import React, {useRef} from 'react' import classes from './Checkout.module.css' export default function Checkout(props) { const nameInputRef = useRef() const streetInputRef = useRef() const postalCodeInputRef = useRef() const cityInputRef = useRef() const confirmHandler =(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() const enteredName = nameInputRef.current.value const enteredStreet = streetInputRef.current.value const enteredPostalCode = postalCodeInputRef.current.value const enteredCity = cityInputRef.current.value } return (
); }
